description: One of the most famous restaurants in the Castelli Romani region in 2022 celebrated 100 years of life under the management of the same family: the Cacciani. Authentic and excellent regional cuisine, served in a welcoming dining room, with the open - view kitchen on one side and a panoramic terrace on the other.
